page.title: 18Saint John's Church
page.content: On Friday July 5th, we went to visit {St. John's Church. Reverend S. Oram} (the Curate) was our guide. The{church}was built in two parts, the first was constructed of blue or black brick in 1842-43 and the second part, of sandstone was added in 1894. The building is already starting to crumble due to weather and pollution. Then we went to the{Altar}and found out that the first Vicar of the church was buried underneath. Recently the church was re-ordered and the{organ}and{choir stalls}were moved to a new{gallery.}Mrs Thomas-Cox surprised us by playing a few tunes! In the{Aumbry}there was bread and wine which had been blessed by the {Priest. The Vestry}held the registers of baptisms,deaths and marriages. In the{Lady Chapel}we saw a beautiful carving of{Jesus}at the{Last Supper.
